title: Oink! India keeps buying pig extract from China to make drugs despite swine flu in the dragon's belly.
text:
China is culling pigs to control the rapidly spreading African swine flu. However, with scant regard to safety norms, India is importing pig extract from the country for use in life-saving drugs. While other nations have tightened the norms, India is yet to adopt stringent measures.
